title.rendered: How Much Space Do Dumpster Files Take Up?

content.rendered:
Files stored in Dumpster take up as much space as they did when stored directly on your phone. Here are a few ways you can free up space on your device:

  1. Upgrade to Dumpster Cloud

Dumpster Cloud backup is a premium feature, enabling users to save & sync all their deleted items to the cloud, ultimately saving valuable space on your device. With Dumpster Cloud, you’ll have unlimited storage! 

  1. Manually Delete any Junk Files

We recommend deleting any unnecessary files every other month or on a regular basis to save additional space and to keep your device running smoothly.

  1. Use Dumpster’s Auto-Clean 

Dumpster can periodically delete files for you! You can turn Auto-Clean on by opening the navigation menu located in the upper left hand side of the homepage.

Tap the “More” tab on the bottom right-hand corner of the screen. From there you will see “General Settings” where you can select “Auto-Clean. Choose how long you want Dumpster to save your deleted files for, before permanently removing them from your device:

  • 1 week
  • 1 month
  • 3 months
